column4: This filesystem will be automatically checked every 22 mounts or 180 days, whichever comes first.  Use tune2fs -c or -i to override., what is this "Use tune2fs -c or -i to override." and did i need to do it? or not anything will help
the last message its result of "mkfs -t ext3 -L backup2 /dev/hda2"
an unneeded fschk seriously slows boot time
